name: VELAIO
description:
VELAIO is a Digital Agency and Software Factory that provides Drupal custom software development, Drupal theming development, Drupal audit, Drupal optimization and Drupal consulting, they are Drupal experts and have more than 8 years developing Drupal projects for corporations and small businesses in Colombia and abroad.
VELAIO have been helping their clients from different sectors like health, government, construction, telecommunications and among others.
